mapper.select: SELECT ord.id, ord.totalAmount, ord.productTotalQuantity, ds.code AS 'status.code', ds.name AS 'status.name', ord.productTotalPrice, ord.member_id AS 'member.id', ord.receiver_id AS 'receiver.id', ord.createTime, ord.orderNum, ord.updateTime, ord.orderChannel AS 'orderChannel.code' FROM qsx_order ord, qsx_dictionary ds WHERE ord.orderStatus = ds.code AND ord.member_id = #{memberId}

SELECT ord.id, ord.totalAmount, ord.productTotalQuantity, ord.orderStatus AS 'status.code', ord.productTotalPrice, ord.member_id AS 'member.id', ord.receiver_id AS 'receiver.id', ord.createTime, ord.orderNum, ord.updateTime, ord.orderChannel AS 'orderChannel.code' FROM qsx_order ord WHERE ord.id = #{orderId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qsx_order ( id, totalAmount, productTotalQuantity, orderStatus, productTotalPrice, member_id, receiver_id, createTime, orderNum, updateTime, orderChannel ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{totalAmount}, #{productTotalQuantity}, #{status.code}, #{productTotalPrice}, #{member.id}, #{receiver.id}, #{createTime}, #{orderNum}, #{updateTime}, #{orderChannel.code} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE totalAmount = #{totalAmount}, productTotalQuantity = #{productTotalQuantity}, orderStatus = #{status.code}, productTotalPrice = #{productTotalPrice}, orderNum = #{orderNum}, updateTime = #{updateTime}, orderChannel = #{orderChannel.code}
